recommended_degree: Desain Komunikasi Visual, Manajemen & Produksi Film Video & TV, Fotografi, Ilmu Komunikasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: As a Videographer Intern, you will support the creative team in producing basic video content for institutional needs. Your responsibilities include assisting with video recording, helping prepare equipment, and capturing simple footage during events or activities. You will also support the editing process by organizing raw files, selecting usable clips, and performing basic edits under supervision. Additionally, you may help create short videos for social media or internal communication. Throughout your internship, you are expected to follow creative guidelines, be attentive to detail, and assist with light tasks assigned by the team to support daily video production activities.
